name: Feles Infernum
description:
LONG LORE:

Follow the adventures of the little cat Kore in hell. Control her through many bloody enemies, jumping rocks or risky platforms! Don't worry, it's a cat, it can wall jump (cats CAN do that).

CONTROLS:

A-D / Arrows: Move;

Z / J: Jump;

X / K: Place a Dot / Select;

F12: Fullscreen ON-OFF;

BEHIND THE GAME:

Feles Infernum is a game made for a Retro-themed Jam in 2020. It was made in two weeks by me and a friend of mine. The game still has bugs but we are happy how it turned.

Palette we used: https://lospec.com/palette-list/crimson
